info.title: LankaConnect API
info.description: Sri Lankan American Community Platform API

get.summary:
Get analytics data for a specific event
Returns view counts, unique viewers, registrations, and conversion rate

Get aggregated analytics dashboard for an organizer
Returns total views, registrations, conversion rates, and top/upcoming events
Requires authentication
Get aggregated analytics dashboard for a specific organizer (Admin only)

post.summary: Register a new user account
Authenticate user and return JWT tokens
Refresh access token using refresh token
Logout user and invalidate refresh token

get.summary: Get current authenticated user profile

post.summary: Authenticate user with Microsoft Entra External ID

requestBody.description: Entra access token and IP address

post.summary: Request password reset email
Reset password using reset token

requestBody.description: Password reset details with token and new password

post.summary: Verify email address using verification token

requestBody.description: Email verification request with user ID and token

get.summary: Health check endpoint for authentication service

post.summary: Creates a new business

get.summary: Gets all businesses (paginated)
Gets a business by ID
Searches businesses with various filters

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search term for business name or description

post.summary: Adds a service to a business

get.summary: Gets all services for a business

post.summary: Uploads an image for a business

get.summary: Gets all images for a business

patch.summary: Sets a business image as primary

parameters.name: imageId
parameters.description: Image ID to set as primary

get.summary: Get all events with optional filtering

post.summary: Create a new event (Organizers only)

get.summary: Search events using full-text search (Epic 2 Phase 3 - PostgreSQL FTS)

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search term to match against event titles and descriptions

parameters.name: isFreeOnly
parameters.description: Optional filter for free events only

parameters.name: startDateFrom
parameters.description: Optional filter for events starting from this date

get.summary: Get event details by ID

delete.summary: Delete an event (Owner only, draft/cancelled events only)

get.summary: Get nearby events within a specified radius of a location (Epic 2 Phase 3 - Spatial Queries)

parameters.name: isFreeOnly
parameters.description: Optional filter for free events only

parameters.name: startDateFrom
parameters.description: Optional filter for events starting from this date

post.summary: Submit event for approval (Owner only)
Publish an event (Owner only)
Cancel an event with reason (Owner only)
Postpone an event with reason (Owner only)
RSVP to an event (Authenticated users)

delete.summary: Cancel RSVP to an event (Authenticated users)

get.summary: Get user's RSVPs (Authenticated users)
Get upcoming events for user (Authenticated users)
Get events pending approval (Admins only)

post.summary: Approve event (Admins only)
Reject event with reason (Admins only)
Add image to event gallery

put.summary: Replace an existing event image with a new one

post.summary: Add video to event gallery
Add user to event waiting list (Authenticated users)

delete.summary: Remove user from event waiting list (Authenticated users)

get.summary: Get waiting list for an event

post.summary: Promote user from waiting list to confirmed registration (Authenticated users)

get.summary: Export event as ICS calendar file (for Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook)

post.summary: Record a social share of an event (for analytics tracking)

get.summary: Health check endpoint for the API
Detailed health check with dependencies

post.summary: Creates a new user

get.summary: Gets a user by ID
Health check endpoint

post.summary: Uploads a profile photo for a user

requestBody.description: Location details (city, state, zipCode, country). Pass all null values to clear location.
Cultural interests (0-10 allowed). Pass empty list to clear all interests.

post.summary:
Links an external OAuth provider to a user's account
Epic 1 Phase 2: Multi-Provider Social Login

delete.summary:
Unlinks an external OAuth provider from a user's account
Epic 1 Phase 2: Multi-Provider Social Login
Business Rule: Cannot unlink last authentication method

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Provider to unlink (Facebook, Google, Apple, Microsoft)

get.summary:
Gets all external OAuth providers linked to a user's account
Epic 1 Phase 2: Multi-Provider Social Login

LanguageRequestDto.description: DTO for language with proficiency level in API requests

LinkExternalProviderRequest.description:
Request model for linking an external OAuth provider
Epic 1 Phase 2: Multi-Provider Social Login

UpdateCulturalInterestsRequest.description: Request model for updating user's cultural interests

UpdateLanguagesRequest.description: Request model for updating user's languages

UpdateLocationRequest.description: Request model for updating user location

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
Bearer.name: Authorization

tags.name: Analytics
tags.description: Event analytics and organizer dashboard endpoints. Track views, registrations, and conversion metrics.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Authentication and authorization endpoints. Handle user registration, login, password management, and profile.

tags.name: Businesses
tags.description: Business directory and services endpoints. Manage business listings, images, and service offerings.

tags.name: Events
tags.description: Event management endpoints. Create, publish, RSVP, and manage community events.

tags.name: Health
tags.description: API health check endpoints. Monitor system status, database connectivity, and cache availability.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: User profile management endpoints. Update profiles, preferences, cultural interests, and languages.
